channel.title: Forum data backups
channel.description: Over time many valuable topics have been posted here in the forums. To make sure this information is not lost in some future forum software migration or backend data corruption - I suggest making backups distributed along with the wiki data backups too.

item.title: Forum data backups
item.dc:creator: HulaHoop
item.description:
Does not look like the forum software supports exporting public data only unfortunately.

Would be a good feature request for upstream.

@fortasse and me do backups.

Good to know thanks.

Sensitive data warning: Since you are a forum admin @HulaHoop, you can download a full database backup that includes user e-mail addresses and hashed passports. Ought to keep private. - https://forums.whonix.org/admin/backups

Understood. I would ask your permission before before making a backup.

Read full topic
